#summary list and description of all the hiberlite classes and templates.

= Introduction =

All classes are placed in the *hiberlite* namespace.

= Front-end =
Users of the library will usually need only 3 classes:
  * Database  - represents an sqlite3 database
  * *sqlid_t* - type of all primary keys in the database
  * *bean_ptr<C>* - template class, represents the smart (and lazy) pointer to the object in the database.
